member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.Import.AnnotationRangeEndInfo
member.summary: Represents the end information of an annotation range in a DOCX document. This class provides details about the position and attributes of the end of an annotation.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.Import.AnnotationRangeEndInfo.AnnotationID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the annotation range end.
member.value: A string that represents the annotation ID.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.Import.BookmarkRangeStartInfo
member.summary: Represents the starting point of a bookmark range in a DOCX document.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.Import.BookmarkRangeStartInfo.BookmarkName
member.summary: Gets the name of the bookmark associated with the range start.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.Import.BookmarkRangeStartInfo.AnnotationID
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the annotation associated with the bookmark range start.
member.value: The unique identifier for the annotation, or null if no annotation is associated.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.Import.PermissionRangeStartInfo
member.summary: Represents the starting point of a permission range in a document imported from OpenXML format.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.Import.PermissionRangeStartInfo.AnnotationID
member.summary: Gets the annotation ID associated with the permission range start information.
member.value: The unique identifier for the annotation.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.Import.PermissionRangeStartInfo.PermissionInfo
member.summary: Represents the permission information for a specific range within a document, detailing access rights and restrictions applied to that range.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.DocxFormatProvider
member.summary: Represents a format provider that can import and export DOCX documents from/to .

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.DocxFormatProvider.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the Docx format provider.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.DocxFormatProvider.FilesDescription
member.summary: Represents the description of the files handled by the Docx format provider in the Telerik RadRichTextBox.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.DocxFormatProvider.SupportedExtensions
member.summary: Gets the supported file extensions for the DOCX format.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.DocxFormatProvider.CanImport
member.summary: Determines whether the specified document can be imported by the DocxFormatProvider.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.DocxFormatProvider.CanExport
member.summary: Determines whether the specified document can be exported to the Open XML Docx format.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.DocxFormatProvider.ExportSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the export settings for the DocxFormatProvider.
member.value: An object representing the settings used during the export process.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.DocxFormatProvider.ImportSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the import settings for the DocxFormatProvider.
member.value: The import settings that determine how the document is processed when imported.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.DocxFormatProvider.Import(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Imports a document from the specified stream in the OpenXml Docx format.
member.param: The stream from which to import the document.
member.returns: A document representation of the imported content.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Docx.DocxFormatProvider.Export(Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.RadDocument,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Exports the specified RadDocument to a DOCX format stream.
member.param: The stream where the exported DOCX content will be written.

member.summary: Gets or sets the current document as HTML

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.DocxDataProvider.SetSource(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte})
member.summary: Sets the source of the DocxDataProvider with the specified dependency object and byte array.
member.param: The dependency object representing the document.
A list of byte arrays to set as the source data.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.DocxDataProvider.GetSource(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Retrieves the source associated with the specified DependencyObject in the OpenXml format.
member.param: The DependencyObject for which to retrieve the source.
member.returns: The source associated with the provided DependencyObject, or null if no source is found.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.OpenXml.DocxDataProvider.GetAttachedDataProvider(System.Windows.DependencyObject)

member.param: The from which to retrieve the attached data provider.
member.returns: The attached data provider associated with the specified .
